subject: Re: [junit] quite OT: Building a system test group
msgSnippet: ... I wouldn t kid about that; I d insist on it. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com Author, JUnit Recipes:
messageBody:
Bradley, Todd wrote:

> Finally, don't underestimate the benefit of hiring a consulting for a
> month or two to help jump start your system test program. I'd recommend
> that the consultant should be me and that the month or two should
> include Oktoberfest. (just kidding)

I wouldn't kid about that; I'd insist on it.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
